edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2014.group19.neverEatAlone.server.dbManager.services

Class DBManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.cs.oose.fall2014.group19.neverEatAlone.server.dbManager.services.DBManager

  • public class DBManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a helper class for database operations. It provides a database handle as well as formatting methods for parameters(results) sent to (received from) the database.
    Author:
    tejasvamsingh

      static org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService GetGraphDBInstance()
      This method returns a graph database instance that is shared by all classes that wish to access the database.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> GetQueryParameterMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> request)
      This method is used for formatting query parameters.
      static java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> GetResultMapList(org.neo4j.cypher.ExecutionResult result)
      This method returns a list of Maps for each entry that is part of a Cypher query result.

    • Method Detail

      • GetGraphDBInstance

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService GetGraphDBInstance()
        This method returns a graph database instance that is shared by all classes that wish to access the database. It also registers the instance for clean shutdown and defines schema constraints for the first time instantiation.
        Returns:

      • GetResultMapList

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> GetResultMapList(org.neo4j.cypher.ExecutionResult result)
        This method returns a list of Maps for each entry that is part of a Cypher query result.
        Parameters:
        result -
        Returns:

      • GetQueryParameterMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> GetQueryParameterMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> request)
        This method is used for formatting query parameters. Note, this is a generic method that assumes every String[] has one element. In case of multiple query parameters, the calling method must take care of this detail. If not, the information may be lost.
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
